sec.title: Houria Djoudi
sec.p: is a Researcher at CIFOR. Her research interests are on vulnerability and adaptation to environmental change, applied to questions of linkages and feed becks in socio-ecological systems.

sec.title: Bruno Locatelli
sec.p: is a Researcher at CIRAD (Agricultural Research for Development) and CIFOR (Center for International Forestry Research). His research interests are on the role of ecosystems in adaptation to climate change.

sec.title: Chlo√© Vaast
sec.p: is a Gender Advisor at the Royal Tropical Institute (KIT), Amsterdam, the Netherlands, and a former Gender Consultant at the Institute of Development Studies (UK), EngenderHealth (US), and CIFOR.

sec.title: Kiran Asher
sec.p: is Associate Professor in the Department of Women, Gender, and Sexuality Studies at the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. Her research focuses on the raced and gendered dimensions of social and environmental change.

sec.title: Maria Brockhaus
sec.p: is a Scientist with the Center for International Forestry Research. Her research interests are on forests and climate policy, examining dimensions of equity within, using political economy approaches, social network and discourse analysis.

sec.title: Bimbika Basnett Sijapati
sec.p: is a Social Scientist based at the Center for International Forestry Research (CIFOR). Her research interests are on applying gender theories to contemporary processes of rural transformation.
